General.Name: Lippo Limited
General.Description: Lippo Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the property investment and development, treasury investment, securities investment, food, healthcare services, and other businesses. The company is involved in the development, letting, sale, and resale of real estate properties; money market and securities investment activities; provision of healthcare management services; and exploration and extraction of minerals. It also manufactures, wholesales, and retails food and beverages, as well as bread, cakes, and other bakery products; operates cafés and kiosks, restaurants, bakeries and bakery corners, bistros, and hotels; and invests in closed-end funds. In addition, the company provides property, project, fund, and investment management services; and real estate agency and consultancy, software product development, management, commercial consulting, financing, and catering services, as well as owns a motor yacht. It operates in Hong Kong, Mainland China, Republic of Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, and internationally. The company is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Lippo Limited is a subsidiary of Lippo Capital Limited.

1.Name: Mr. Luen Wai  Lee BBS, CPA, J.P., JP
1.Title: MD, CEO & Exec. Director
